originalText.text: This school is so disgusting. My daughter is in pre k and she gets lice every 2 weeks. I told the principal and the only thing she had to say was if 5 morr parents report their child has lice then she will put up a notice to parents. This is the 3rd time in 3 months she has gotten lice.

originalText.text: My experience in this school was was great I graduated in 2011 but since i left noticed it has gotten worse many old people hang out in the playground which is creepy to have children playing and just people staring it’s actually scary at night to walk through that alley there should be more lights and workers around.

originalText.text: I GRADUATED IN 1975 AND ONLY PROBLEM I HAD WAS WITH MS SINGMAN MY EXPERIENCE IN THE 70S WERE GREAT I HAD AN 12TH GRADE READING & VOCABULARY I WAS BAD BUT I HAD GREAT TEACHERS 4TH MS JONAS MR MORGAN AKA (SHAFT) AND TODAY WE HAD OUR REUNION 6TH WITH JOYCE GREENLEAF WRITER ACTRESS BEST INSTUCTOR IN THE WORLD 5TH GRADE GLEE PLAYS AND TOOK STUDENTS TO HER HOME CANT DO THAT TODAY 5/7/2017 SHE CAME FROM CALI BACK TO HARLEM GOOGLE HER
